shoes.name: Puma Avengers edition
shoes.desc: Upper material is made of Premium Seude Material that is comfortable, lightweight, easy to clean, and can be paired with a wide range of outfits. The sole is made of TPR which provides high grip, is water resistant and flexible. Cushioned insole with soft breathable lining. Dutch support for extra comfort. Care: Use a soft clean cloth to wipe the shoe dust gently. Air Dry (do not twist the shoes, avoid tumble dry).

shoes.name: Puma Captain America
shoes.desc: Upper material is made of Knit Fabric that is comfortable, lightweight, easy to clean, and can be paired with a wide range of outfits. The sole is made of EVA which provides high flexibility, comfort and TPU which provides better grip. Cushioned insole with soft breathable lining. Care: Spot wash with mild soap using a soft clean cloth. Air Dry (do not twist the shoes, avoid tumble dry).

shoes.name: Jordans spider sneaker
shoes.desc: Upper material is made of PU and Mesh that is comfortable, lightweight, easy to clean, and can be paired with a wide range of outfits. Cushioned insole with soft breathable lining. Dutch support for extra comfort. Care: Spot wash with mild soap using a soft clean cloth. Air Dry (do not twist the shoes, avoid tumble dry).

shoes.name: Nike Dark Knight
shoes.desc: Shop for Batman: The Dark Knight Men High Top Sneakers OnlineReflective shoes are footwear that includes a strip of fabric designed to reflect light.This simple feature can offer better visibility of shoe in dim light.Reflective shoes often use retroreflective materials that do not glow on their own but can reflect light from another light source.This item is eligible for return under our easy 30 day return policy. No questions asked.MRP: Rs. 3999/- incl. of all taxes.
